reviewText:
This film was wonderful and powerful - it reminds us how we can take what God is doing for us in the Sacraments for granted while thinking we are being religious. I know from experience that prayers are answer but not like in the movie - it was an uplifting experience - hope there is an English version so I can share it with friends - I have gotten other copies to share already

Bob Kobe
I have purchased this item for a lot of Hispanic individuals at our church. Everyone likes the item and share it with friends.
The best movie to watch with the family. Highly recomended. A great family value. It helped me understand more in detail the meaning of faith and how to prepare for heaven.

I saw this movie..and my kids and I loved it. The message I received from it was no matter where you are evil will still try to lure its way in your mind, but he will never be stronger than god...as long as we belive and have god in our hearts..GOD is always there for us..sometimes we are the ones that forget about him....LOVED IT!!!
Una obra de fe.
The message couldn't come any clearer....
We're trying to play it to the young people
excelant.
Awesome story.
Received it beforehand. Will purchase again.
Great movie!!
Great
Great movie, very powerful. It made me realized how much I didn't know about God and holy mass. It changed my perspective. I really recommend this movie to everyone;)
Movie arrived earlier than expected, content of movie escellent
Si todos tuviramos la dicha de mirar esta pelcula, nuestra vida espiritual cambiara dramticamente. Maravilloso mensaje.
I love this movie. Can watch over and over again. My kids love it as well.
Muy recomendada para cualquier publico que quiera aprender acerca de la Santa Misa!
Hola  I bauth this movie el gram milagro I really liked  and my all family liked this is why I buy on Amazon delivery faster and on time too it's amazing
Thank you
Just great movie you can enjoy with the whole family and learn a lot
Excellent movie for the whole family
Like it.
Everything  is working  perfectly
Loved it!!!
VERY GOOD.
Excellent. Highly recommend it

Great movie
Para reflexionar
Super great movie
I love this movie, very inspirational
Great movie and great quality, will recommend it to every one
If you really want to know the miracle that occurs during a Mass, you have to see this movie, is very beautiful and great for your children understand the true courage to be Catholic.

One of the best animated movies ever. Once you see it you will not be able to see the Eucharist the same way ever again. This video helps Catholics and non-Catholics to understand the great gift of the Real Presence of the Lord at Mass, in the Eucharist. A must see.
Had purchased the film before. Now purchased the film for a member in my church?
Great movie

both the great miracle  and el gran milagro have the options to be played in both English and Spanish... a great way to teach people of all ages, about the Mass.... .  There are a couple of things that are not accurate, but considering the rest, this is a great movie.... I have used for all the catechism children and their parents.... I got a great reaction... more attention and reverence at Mass.
Love it
Bravo, no dejen de verla y disfrutar esta belleza en mensaje y produccin!
Es un gran ejemplo tanto como para nios como para adultos
me encanto!
I recommend this movie
Grate we did like it a lot!
Love the story ! Got  3 in Spanish as gifts and all 3 arrived in English but the cover titles are in Spanish , dissatisfied!
Good buy
Es una hermosa historia para que los nios comprendan y aprendan de que se vive en la misa.
the best
I Love the movie

I think this is the  best movie I've seen in a long time. It is the best not for the images or production. It is the best for the feelings and message it communicates. My kids really loved it too. They have seen it like 5 or 6 times so far. I recommend this movie to every one that loves Jesus and its message of salvation.
I have bought several copies of this movie and I have given them out as gifts to many of my friends and family.

I love this movie and could watch it a 100 times.  The first 5 times I watched it I cried buckets of tears at the power of the Mass and how I feel that although I was born and raised Catholic it renewed such a deep and powerful awe in the Mass.  The angel that tells the story is a wonderful companion.
I have purchased about 25 of these DVD's in English & Spanish and have freely given them away.  Everyone loves them and have enjoyed them as much as I have... would I recommend this - ABSOLUTELY YES!  It is good for children and adults and will touch the hearts of everyone.  Idea gift for any occasion!
God bless,
Phyllis
Muy buena pelicula para la audiencia en espaol al explicar la Santa Misa. Hermosa les recomiendo que la vea en la catequesis o en familia. Exelente me gusto mucho, demaciado.
A well made movie made in Mexico. Lovely and well made. Great for the family and based on the Catholic mass.

Excellent! - can't wait for more movies with similar themes. Hopefully, they could come with movies about the Saints.

Fabulosa pelcula! Gracias a las personas que hicieron posible esta pelcula. Ha aumentado el conocimiento y mi de Catolica.
Great for all to watch! Para todos - para ver que pass on La Misa Catolica! Topics: sacrifice, temptation, offering, death, afterlife, and relating with others.
I needed this video to show family and friends from church, and they loved it! I will keep sharing this video.
Yes indeed!... with its animated style, it is a good reminder for all of us Catholic!  Do not hesitate, to purchase a copy for yourself and for a gift!
Beautiful!!!!!!!! I definitely recommend it! It is one of the most beautiful movies I've seen in a long time! Great for a Christmas gift!!!!

My mom asked me to order a bunch of this movie in English and Spanish to share with her friends. I watched it and it was very good information and message for Catholics. Shows us the blessings the church traditions give us and how to use them properly. Everyone has appreciated this film who has seen it.
I was a bit uneasy of whether or not to buy this item from this vendor. But after having gotten my order, I was absolutely delighted, I was very satisfied with my purchase.

loved the film it has changed the way i listen to the mass. how awesome how our gradian angles take to God our petitions and prayers. I highly recomend this film to anyone who wants to know what happens during mass. it will change the way you see the mass. it did me.

Short and meaningful movie. A must see, Great tool for kids and teens
Everyone should see this movie
Fast deliver, good packaging.
I enjoyed watching this film with my family!!! Amazing quality and very fast delivery! Loved it thank you very much!
The product came as promised!! It is a great movie to show First Communion students. It show the value of the Eucharist in the Catholic Church. The quality is great as well!

I Love the content, I think every catholic should see this movie, it is so clear and the message is so true!!!
After I saw this movie Every time that I go to mass is  a different experience for me, the movie made me realize that we shouldn't be looking for miracles every day....the miracle happen in every mass.
The only thing that , i was little unsatisfied , was I order it spanish as a gift I was going to make. And the movie was in English.
Gives us a strong sense of how hard life can be and yet find comfort and hope when we are most vulnerable
Una de las peliculas mas hermosas que he visto.  Explica TODO lo que sucede en el transcurso de la misa.
Wonderful!!! Extraordinary good!!! Great!!! Fantastic for adults and kids! It is a good gift for children in: Easter, Fist Communion, birthday or Christmas.
One of my favorite movies since I found it I give my family and friends to enjoy it thank you for your service God bless you all!!!

Me encanto esta pelicula la vi con mi familia a todos nos gusto! A mi por me gusto mucho por que no tiene mucho que dios se llevo a mi abuelita al cielo y esta pelicula me me ayudo a darme cuenta que aunque no la pueda ver en la iglesia o en los lugares que yo valla ella todavia esta a lado de mi.
I have seen it in total 4 times now, and will probably see it quite a few times more. I'm a religion teacher and it really exceeded my expectations.

Great clarity of images and a topic that every catholic must know about the mass. I recommend it to everybody who need to know more about mass celebration. It depicts how the Catholic Church sees the mass.
After I saw this movie it changed my way jn a very good way of when I go to church
Esta pelicula esta bien hecha y facil de entender y con un mensaje muy claro y especifico de que es lo sucede en la celebracion de la misa.
I love the movie, it has a deep meaning and It is a excelent condition cosidering that it is pre-owned.
si has leido "La cena del cordero" de Scott Hahn te recomiendo "El gran milagro" es como un  complemento  de  nuestra fe catolica.
In a simple and human way, the concept of the supernatural in everyday life is presented as well. I haven't seen anything else like it.

It was the product I was looking for.  This movie moves peoples heart and spirit.
Product come in with in expected time and the quaility is good

The inspirational messages portrayed in this movie was very moving. While the production quality is far below the image quality of big animation firms, the story more than compensates for this deficiency. A must see for all who profess the Catholic faith.
Recomiendo esta pelicula especialmente para Catolicos sobre la importancia de la Santa Misa y el valor que tiene.  Estupenda para nios y adultos.
The movie did not play very well, it skipped every other scene the first time we played it. I thought I bought a brand new movie!

Basada en las revelaciones que han recibido algunas personas msticas, la cinta cinematogrfica nos presenta una bella realidad de lo que verdaderamente sucede durante la Santa Misa.  Un material muy apropiado para la familia, clases de catequesis, clases de confirmacion, Ministros Extraordinarios de la Santa Eucarista y cualquier otro grupo parroquial!! Definitivamente, es una cinta muy digna de su tiempo!!

Que la gracia bendiga a quien lea este humilde mensaje!!
La peli Es genial no hay duda alguna!!! Altamente recomendada para nios y adultos. El precio Es ridiculo para el bien espiritual q hace en el alma
great exellent viewning and beautiful movie. the kids really enjoyed it. Also, it arrived promply  like it said it would and in  very good conditions.

Thanks for sending me this movie. I have been looking all over for it.
The price was AMAZING. Thanks again for the good quality
Lo que ms me gusto es que recib mi pedido mucho antes de la fecha sealada, esto para mi me dice que tiene muy buen servicio al cliente.
Got what I paid for
Fast delivery and movie looks great.
It is a beautiful video with a clear message
Sorry but the DvD quality was bad
Great teaching g for all Catholics chrtistians
Awesome movie!
Excelente para las Catequesis para la Primera Comunion

I was waiting for this review .
The movie is great but is in English .
I asked for a movie in Spanish .
So my relatives from Mexico can watch it and understand .
The DVD case is in Spanish but the actual DVD is in English with no secundary audio or close captions options

Excelente pelcula! La misa es el cielo en la tierra
Excellent movie! Mass is Heaven on earth
